channel.title: The Curious Cases of Vera and Nina
channel.itunes:author: WonderAI
channel.description:
Join the delightful adventures of Vera and Nina, two young sister sleuths who turn their charming Sunset Park neighborhood in Santa Monica into a playground of mystery and discovery. Twelve-year-old Vera and her nine-year-old sister Nina, accompanied by their loyal beagle Bean and the theatrical squirrel Herman, tackle the most peculiar puzzles their community has to offer.
From schoolyard conundrums to park predicaments and neighborhood enigmas, each episode follows this endearing team as they piece together unusual clues and uncover the secrets that make their little corner of the world so special. With a perfect blend of local charm, heartwarming moments, and unexpected twists, these young detectives prove that even the smallest mysteries can lead to the biggest adventures.
Disclaimer: This description is experimental and was generated by AI. It may contain factual errors.
channel.itunes:summary: Two sister sleuths solve neighborhood mysteries with their pets in Santa Monica's Sunset Park.

item.title: The Mystery of the Vanishing Guitar
item.itunes:title: The Mystery of the Vanishing Guitar
item.description:
A mysterious disappearance throws Vera's Battle of the Bands preparations into chaos when her electric guitar vanishes in a flash of purple sparkles. As the leader of Pass the Snacks Darn It, Vera must solve this peculiar case before tomorrow's competition at Memorial Park. Alongside her faithful companions – practical Nina, analytical Hermione the squirrel, and the ever-observant Bean – Vera follows a trail of magical-seeming clues: glowing paw prints, glitter-covered guitar picks, and floating musical notes, all accompanied by the tantalizing scent of chocolate chip cookies. Drawing from their experience with the Franklin Street Fair and the lavender lemonade incident, the team knows that seemingly magical occurrences often have surprisingly ordinary explanations. This latest mystery weaves together elements of music, friendship, and unexpected revelations, building toward what promises to be Sunset Park's most unforgettable Battle of the Bands performance yet.
Learn More: • 'National Battle of the Bands Competition Guide' (https://www.nationalbattleofthebands.com) • 'Young Musicians Guide to Battle of the Bands' (https://www.myboca.us/2093/Battle-of-the-Bands) • 'School of Rock - Movie' (https://www.amazon.com/School-of-Rock/dp/B000IJ7AJA) • 'The Music Mystery Series for Kids - Book' (https://www.amazon.com/Music-Mystery-Series-Kids/dp/B08F7N2XYZ)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Lucky Lavender Mic Mystery
item.itunes:title: The Lucky Lavender Mic Mystery
item.description:
A heartwarming tale of friendship unfolds at the historic Santa Monica Pier carousel building as young Nina prepares for the performance of her lifetime. When her lucky lavender microphone mysteriously vanishes before her crucial audition to open for the legendary Diamond Soul Siren, Nina's sister Vera springs into action. With help from their unusual detective team - including Hermione, a case-solving parrot, and Bean, a perceptive therapy dog - they uncover an unexpected culprit. Rather than succumbing to rivalry, Nina transforms a potential sabotage into a touching moment of collaboration, sharing her lucky microphone in a spontaneous duet with classmate Kaylee. Their harmonious performance captures the attention of the Diamond Soul Siren herself, demonstrating that true talent shines brightest when shared. This episode beautifully weaves themes of perseverance, forgiveness, and the transformative power of music, proving that sometimes the greatest victories come not from competing, but from lifting each other up.
Learn More: • "Once Upon a Beat" (https://wondery.com/shows/once-upon-a-beat/) • "Breakthrough" (https://wondery.com/shows/breakthrough/) • "Kids and Family Shows on Wondery" (https://wondery.com/genre/kids-family/)

item.title: The Case of the Midnight Freezer Fiend
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Midnight Freezer Fiend
item.description:
A mysterious kitchen discovery unfolds as sisters Vera and Nina face a freezer crisis that threatens to derail an important science project. When their early morning routine is disrupted by an open freezer door, melted ice cream, and compromised ice core samples, the young detectives spring into action. Using their investigative skills and help from their unusual allies - Bean the beagle and Hermione the squirrel - they uncover a trail of evidence leading to an unexpected culprit. The case takes a scientific turn as they race against time to salvage Nina's frozen samples using their mother's blast chiller, drawing on past experience from their previous investigation, "The Case of the Melting Message." This engaging mystery weaves together elements of STEM education, problem-solving, and the special bond between sisters while teaching valuable lessons about proper freezer maintenance and the importance of securing scientific specimens.
Learn More: • 'Wow in the World' (https://wondery.com/shows/wow-in-the-world/) • 'Stories Podcast' (https://wondery.com/shows/stories-podcast/) • 'Food Safety in the Home - Article' (https://www.ift.org/news-and-publications/podcasts/omnivore/scidish-jun-2025-food-safety) • 'The Wonder Podcast for Curious Kids' (https://wondery.com/genre/kids-family/)

item.title: The Mystery of Mom's Neon Green Makeover
item.itunes:title: The Mystery of Mom's Neon Green Makeover
item.description:
A whimsical mystery unfolds when two young detectives discover their beloved Adirondack bench transformed into an eye-catching electric green masterpiece. Following the latest trend in bold outdoor furniture colors for 2025, their mother's surprise makeover using eco-friendly "Electric Meadow Green" paint sparks both shock and intrigue. The episode weaves together family dynamics, sustainable choices, and the charm of neighborhood mysteries as Vera, Nina, their clever beagle Bean, and Hermione the squirrel initially suspect foul play. The discovery of a receipt from Sustainable Solutions reveals their mother's mischievous embrace of contemporary outdoor decor trends, aligning with the growing movement toward eco-conscious exterior paint options. This lighthearted tale explores themes of sustainability, family surprises, and the sometimes shocking nature of change, all while maintaining the series' signature blend of humor and mystery-solving charm.

item.title: The Case of the Disappearing Dragon Book
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Disappearing Dragon Book
item.description:
A heartwarming mystery unfolds at the Santa Monica Main Library when Nina's origami dragon book appears perpetually overdue despite her insistence of returning it. Accompanied by her sister Vera, their wise old beagle Bean, and the theatrical squirrel Herman, they embark on an investigation that reveals an unexpected twist. Following Bean's keen nose through the library stacks, they discover a secret fort constructed from "missing" books, where seven-year-old Lucy has created her own literary sanctuary while waiting for her mother's work shift. The story delicately addresses themes of childhood loneliness, community connection, and the importance of library accessibility, all while maintaining its playful charm through Herman's dramatic commentary and Bean's world-weary wisdom. This tale showcases how a simple misunderstanding transforms into an opportunity for friendship, featuring a touching resolution where Nina teaches Lucy proper library procedures and the art of origami dragons.
Learn More: • Stories Podcast (https://wondery.com/shows/stories-podcast) • "The Library Dragon" - Book (https://www.amazon.com/Library-Dragon-Carmen-Agra-Deedy/dp/156145091X) • "Dragons (Amazing Mysteries)" - Book (https://www.amazon.com/Dragons-Amazing-Mysteries-Valerie-Bodden/dp/1640262172) • "The Mystery of the Golden Dragons" - Book (https://www.amazon.com/Mystery-Golden-Dragons-Book-ebook/dp/B00PGUMG8I)

item.title: The Ice Cream Truck Internet Caper
item.itunes:title: The Ice Cream Truck Internet Caper
item.description:
Two tech-savvy sisters uncover the truth behind mysterious WiFi outages plaguing their Santa Monica neighborhood. When their home internet connection fails for the fourth time in a week, Vera and Nina, along with their perceptive beagle Bean and a chatty squirrel named Herman, notice suspicious patterns emerging throughout Sunset Park. From malfunctioning card readers at Gelson's to widespread connectivity issues near Marine Park, the signs point to something bigger than routine technical difficulties. Their investigation leads them to discover their beloved ice cream truck driver, Mr. Martinez, testing an innovative community internet service. What initially appears as a potential cyber threat transforms into a heartwarming revelation about bringing free, reliable internet access to their community, complete with the sweet reward of ice cream for the young detectives.
Learn More: • 'Little Stories Everywhere' (https://wondery.com/shows/little-stories-everywhere) • 'Kids and Family Podcasts' (https://wondery.com/genre/kids-family/) • 'How Does the Internet Work?' item.title: The Case of Dad's Musical Mystery Snacks
item.itunes:title: The Case of Dad's Musical Mystery Snacks
item.description:
A whimsical mystery unfolds when Dad's peculiar tooting disrupts the peaceful routine of sisters Vera and Nina, their cynical beagle Bean, and Herman, the theatrical squirrel. The strange sounds echoing through their Sunset Park home lead to an investigation worthy of junior detectives. As Dad mysteriously cancels his Memorial Park jog and emits increasingly musical digestive sounds, the unlikely team discovers the culprit: a nostalgic raid on the kids' secret stash of Dunkaroos and Pop Rocks. The combination proves too tempting for Dad, who couldn't resist reliving his childhood snacking adventures. Through clever deduction, sisterly teamwork, and a dash of Herman's dramatic flair, this heartwarming tale reveals that sometimes the simplest mysteries have the sweetest solutions, reminding us that sharing treats – and even embarrassing moments – brings families closer together.

item.title: The Sheet Music Switcheroo: When Taylor Swift Met Mario
item.itunes:title: The Sheet Music Switcheroo: When Taylor Swift Met Mario
item.description:
A musical mystery unfolds when Nina discovers her downloaded Taylor Swift sheet music produces video game themes instead of pop hits. Her ninety-nine cent bargain from Sheet Music Express reveals a sophisticated bootleg operation running out of a Santa Monica internet cafe, where popular songs are being replaced with classic gaming soundtracks. With help from her sister Vera, their intuitive beagle Bean, and Herman the tech-savvy squirrel, Nina uncovers a scheme targeting young musicians with deceptively altered arrangements. The investigation takes a humorous turn as the group realizes Nina's attempts to play "Cruel Summer," "Karma," and "Shake It Off" have been inadvertently transformed into themes from The Legend of Zelda, Jaws, and Super Mario Brothers, leading to an unexpected blend of contemporary pop and retro gaming nostalgia.
Learn More: • The Curious Cases of Vera and Nina (https://wondery.com/shows/curious-cases-vera-nina) • Taylor Swift Official Sheet Music - Book (https://www.halleonard.com/product/306916/taylor-swift) • Authorized Digital Sheet Music (https://www.musicnotes.com) • Taylor Swift Official Store (https://store.taylorswift.com)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Great Smart Home Meltdown
item.itunes:title: The Great Smart Home Meltdown
item.description:
A mysterious wave of smart device failures sweeps through Sunset Park when young tech enthusiast Vera discovers her Sonos speaker won't connect for violin practice. Together with her sister Nina, their beagle Bean, and Herman the squirrel, they uncover a neighborhood-wide crisis affecting everything from speakers to security cameras. The investigation leads them to discover that a neighbor's amateur network security testing, combined with their father's well-intentioned mesh network setup, has triggered a "smart device apocalypse." Using Bean's intuitive suggestion and Nina's quick organizing skills, they coordinate a synchronized router reset across the neighborhood, restoring harmony to their connected community. This charming episode explores themes of modern technology dependence, community cooperation, and the unintended consequences of DIY network security testing, all while delivering practical insights into troubleshooting smart home devices.
Learn More: • 'Mesh Network Troubleshooting Guide' (https://en.community.sonos.com/advanced-setups-229133/sonos-and-mesh-networks-can-play-in-the-same-sandbox-6883499) • 'Smart Home Security Basics - Book' (https://amazon.com/books/smart-home-security-basics) • 'Network Security for Beginners' (https://en.community.sonos.com/speakers-229128/sonos-system-won-t-connect-to-new-home-wifi-network-6889502) • 'Sonos Troubleshooting Guide' (https://en.community.sonos.com/speakers-229128/nothing-fixes-intermittent-cutting-out-6887721)

item.title: The Tooth Fairy's Secret Beta Test
item.itunes:title: The Tooth Fairy's Secret Beta Test
item.description:
Step into the magical world of Nina's loose tooth, where ordinary dental milestones transform into extraordinary adventures. When Nina notices her wiggly tooth has a peculiar sparkle and makes the sound of tiny bells, it sets off an enchanting investigation with her sister Vera, their wise beagle Bean, and the theatrical squirrel Herman. Together, they uncover the Tooth Fairy's secret cavity-prevention program, following a trail of moonlight-written scrolls through Sunset Park. This whimsical tale weaves together childhood nostalgia, magical dental care, and the special bond between siblings, all while solving the mystery of why some baby teeth come with an extra sprinkle of magic.
Learn More: • 'How to Catch the Tooth Fairy - Book' (https://www.amazon.ca/Catch-Tooth-Fairy-Adam-Wallace/dp/1492637335) • 'The Tooth Fairy's Gift - Children's Book' (https://www.amazon.ca/Tooth-Fairy-Story-Fairys-Childrens/dp/B0BRLVSFMZ) • 'Twinkle, the Tooth Fairy - Book' (https://www.amazon.com/Twinkle-Tooth-Fairy-Magical-Bedtime/dp/B0FCXR41RR) • 'The Tooth Book: For Children - Book' (https://www.amazon.com/Tooth-Book-Children-Learning-Bewildering/dp/1952343097)

item.title: The Case of the Musical Mischief Maker
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Musical Mischief Maker
item.description:
A mysterious case of a detuning violin leads young detective Vera to discover an unexpected culprit in her Santa Monica home. As she prepares for her upcoming recital at Memorial Park, Vera's violin repeatedly loses its tune, causing frustration and concern. Her sister Nina's playful suggestion of a haunted instrument gives way to keen observation when she spots telltale walnut dust on the strings. The mystery unravels when Herman, their squirrel friend, confesses to mistaking the violin's tuning pegs for his morning workout equipment, having confused them with walnuts from the new tree at Clover Park. This whimsical tale of music, misunderstandings, and squirrel aerobics showcases the clever problem-solving abilities of the sister detectives, while their loyal beagle Bean provides silent support from her window-side perch. The solution comes with a creative compromise: real walnuts from Gelson's in exchange for leaving the violin's pegs intact.
Learn More: • "The ABCs of Violin for the Absolute Beginner" - Book (https://www.amazon.com/ABCs-Violin-Absolute-Beginner-Book/dp/0825871247) • "A Tune a Day for Violin" - Book (https://www.amazon.com/Paul-Herfurth-Tune-Day-Violin/dp/0825635861) • "Violin Manual: How to Assess, Buy, Set-up and Maintain Your Violin" - Book (https://www.amazon.com/Violin-Manual-Assess-Set-up-Maintain/dp/1785216511)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Case of the Laundry-Loving Crow
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Laundry-Loving Crow
item.description:
A clever crow with an eye for fashion transforms a peaceful Sunday afternoon into a peculiar mystery when all the freshly folded laundry vanishes from the living room couch. Sisters Vera and Nina, along with their grumpy but astute beagle Bean and Herman the theatrical squirrel, follow a trail of clues from their Sunset Park home to Marine Park's playground. The investigation reveals an enterprising bird who's been methodically "borrowing" clothing from the neighborhood to create the most stylish nest in Santa Monica, complete with Dad's running shirt and Mom's missing yoga pants. Through careful observation, teamwork, and help from their animal companions, the young detectives piece together how the crafty crow managed to dismantle an hour's worth of folding, one garment at a time, proving that sometimes the most unusual suspects have a flair for interior decorating that extends well beyond their natural habitat.
Learn More: • 'Call Me Curious' (https://wondery.com/shows/call-me-curious/) • 'Something Was Wrong' (https://wondery.com/shows/something-was-wrong/) • 'Urban Wildlife: A Guide to Santa Monica's Animal Neighbors - Book' (https://amazon.com/books/urban-wildlife-santa-monica) • 'Marine Park Playground Guide' (https://www.santamonica.gov/places/parks/marine-park)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Case of the Wandering Stuffed Pup
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Wandering Stuffed Pup
item.description:
A beloved stuffed dog named Spot vanishes from Vera's pillow, sparking an urgent morning investigation through the streets of Santa Monica. When memories surface of a previous day's violin practice at Clover Park, the detective team springs into action. Vera, her sister Nina, their elderly beagle Bean, and Herman the squirrel follow a trail of clues from a telling blue thread caught in freshly trimmed bushes to the park maintenance office. Their persistence pays off when they discover Spot safely waiting on the groundskeeper's desk, having been rescued from thorny branches the evening before. This heartwarming tale of lost and found showcases the unbreakable bond between a child and their cherished comfort object, while celebrating the power of observation, teamwork, and the unexpected heroes who help reunite treasured possessions with their rightful owners.
Learn More: • Highlights Mystery Theater (https://wondery.com/shows/highlights-mystery-theater) • Little Stories Everywhere (https://wondery.com/genre/kids-family/) • "Lost and Found" - Book (https://www.amazon.com/Lost-Found-Oliver-Jeffers/dp/0399245030) • "The Velveteen Rabbit" - Book (https://www.amazon.com/Velveteen-Rabbit-Margery-Williams/dp/0385077254)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: Herman's Secret: A Backyard Gender Reveal
item.itunes:title: Herman's Secret: A Backyard Gender Reveal
item.description:
A heartwarming revelation unfolds when two young detectives discover their backyard squirrel friend Herman is actually Hermione – and she's expecting babies! In this charming episode of childhood discovery, sisters Vera and Nina, along with their vigilant beagle Bean, navigate the surprising news while showcasing the importance of friendship, acceptance, and caring for wildlife. From transforming a vintage Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles lunchbox into a cozy nursery to learning valuable lessons about assumptions and identity, this tale brings together mystery, humor, and heart. Hermione's theatrical flair and literary appreciation shine through her Melville-inspired nickname, while the sisters' innovative problem-solving skills and unconditional acceptance demonstrate the magic of childhood friendship. Set against the backdrop of Santa Monica, this episode perfectly captures the wonder of discovering extraordinary stories in ordinary places, proving that sometimes the most delightful mysteries are hiding right in our own backyard.
Learn More: • "Nuts About Squirrels: Young Reader's Guide" (https://bookriot.com/squirrel-books-for-young-readers/) • "Notable Children's Recordings 2025" (https://www.ala.org/alsc/awardsgrants/notalists/ncr) • "Great Audiobooks for Kids" (https://www.commonsensemedia.org/lists/great-audiobooks-for-kids) • "Adventures, Magic, and Talking Squirrels" (https://www.penguin.co.in/adventures-magic-and-talking-squirrels-4-new-childrens-books-to-read-this-may/)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Great Toilet Paper Caper: Squirrels Gone Rogue
item.itunes:title: The Great Toilet Paper Caper: Squirrels Gone Rogue
item.description:
A mysterious toilet paper shortage grips Ocean Park Boulevard when Nina discovers their house completely out of rolls, despite Mom's recent purchase. Following their grumpy but reliable beagle Bean's keen nose, sisters Vera and Nina uncover a peculiar trail of paper leading to Marine Park's community garden. With help from their dramatic squirrel friend Herman, they discover his cousin Harriet leading an ambitious architectural project – an eco-friendly squirrel sanctuary built entirely from "borrowed" toilet paper. The sisters' detective work reveals that what initially seemed like a neighborhood conspiracy turns out to be a creative example of urban wildlife adaptation. This charming mystery showcases themes of sustainability, family dynamics, and the importance of communication as the girls negotiate a peaceful resolution between the human and squirrel communities of Santa Monica. Their investigation proves that sometimes the most surprising explanations are also the simplest ones, especially when dealing with resourceful rodents with a flair for sustainable architecture.
Learn More: • Wondery Kids (https://wondery.com/kids) • 'Urban Wildlife: A Guide to City Creatures - Book' (https://amazon.com/books/urban-wildlife-guide) • 'Santa Monica Community Gardens' (https://www.santamonica.gov/community-gardens) • 'Living with Urban Wildlife Guide' (https://wildlife.ca.gov/living-with-wildlife)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Great Costco Caper: A Heart Behind the Heist
item.itunes:title: The Great Costco Caper: A Heart Behind the Heist
item.description:
Young detectives Vera and Nina uncover an unexpected mystery during a routine Costco shopping trip in Marina Del Rey. When shoppers report missing items from their carts, the girls, along with their secret companions - Bean the beagle and Herman the squirrel - investigate the curious case. Their sleuthing leads them to Devon, a former classmate who's been secretly collecting items to create a makeshift free store for children who can't afford birthday presents. The episode tackles themes of economic hardship, community support, and creative problem-solving as the young detectives help transform Devon's well-intentioned but misguided efforts into a legitimate donation program. Through their innovative solution and collaboration with store management, they establish a sustainable way for Costco members to help local families in need, proving that even the smallest detectives can make a big difference in their community.
Learn More: • Costco Charitable Giving Programs (https://www.costco.com/charitable-giving.html) • Children's Miracle Network Hospitals at Costco (https://costcowholesalecorp.childrensmiraclenetworkhospitals.org/) • Costco Community Commitment (https://www.costco.com/my-life-commitment-to-communities.html)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Great Ball Deflation Mystery
item.itunes:title: The Great Ball Deflation Mystery
item.description:
A mysterious morning unfolds in Santa Monica's Sunset Park when sisters Vera and Nina discover all their sports balls mysteriously deflated. With their grumpy beagle Bean and Herman, a theatrical squirrel, they follow a peculiar trail of peanut butter from their backyard to Memorial Park, where they uncover an unexpected scene. Their neighbor, Mrs. Applebaum, a former physical therapist, has repurposed their balls for her senior yoga class, using peanut butter as a makeshift grip aid for her arthritis-affected students. This charming mystery highlights the importance of community, creative problem-solving, and the unexpected ways people adapt everyday items for therapeutic purposes, though perhaps borrowing without asking wasn't the best approach.
Learn More: • Vive Hand Therapy Exercise Balls for Arthritis (https://www.amazon.com/Vive-Squeeze-Therapy-Exercise-Arthritis/dp/B0DJN6NQ8K) • Healthy Seniors Complete Hand Therapy Kit (https://www.amazon.com/Healthy-Seniors-Complete-Hand-Therapy/dp/B07RFLNWKN) • Physical Therapy Hand Exercise Guide for Seniors (https://www.amazon.com/Healthy-Seniors-Squeeze-Balls-Therapy/dp/B08HCFKSYL) • Santa Monica Memorial Park Programs (https://www.santamonica.gov/parks/memorial-park)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Great Walnut Heist at Whole Foods
item.itunes:title: The Great Walnut Heist at Whole Foods
item.description:
A whimsical mystery unfolds in Santa Monica when Herman, a dramatic squirrel with a passion for perfectly curated nuts, discovers his prized collection of 37 walnuts has vanished from behind the garage. Together with sisters Vera and Nina, plus their skeptical beagle companion Bean, the team follows a trail of clues leading to an unexpected culprit: the local Whole Foods Market. Through clever deduction and Bean's keen nose, they discover Herman's carefully selected walnuts have been transformed into an upscale "Artisanal Small-Batch Sunset Park Squirrel-Foraged" product. The investigation reveals a surprising connection between Herman and the store's sustainable foraging program, complete with a friendly green-aproned employee who's been leaving samples. This charming tale weaves together themes of friendship, mystery-solving, and the humorous intersection of wildlife entrepreneurship with artisanal food culture.
Learn More: • 'Call Me Curious' (https://wondery.com/shows/call-me-curious) • 'The Mystery Kids Podcast' (https://podcasts.apple.com/il/podcast/the-mystery-kids-podcast/id1522936362) • 'Santa Monica: A Look at Yesterday and Today - Book' (https://www.amazon.com/Santa-Monica-Look-Yesterday-Today/dp/1531673945) • 'Whole Foods Market Santa Monica' (https://www.wholefoodsmarket.com/stores/santamonica)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Taylor Swift Switcheroo at School of Rock
item.itunes:title: The Taylor Swift Switcheroo at School of Rock
item.description:
A mysterious poster announcing Taylor Swift's surprise appearance at School of Rock Santa Monica sets young detectives Vera and Nina on an intriguing investigation. When Nina discovers the exciting announcement, her sister Vera's skepticism leads them to question the authenticity of the claim, especially given Taylor's European tour schedule. With their animal companions - Herman, a dramatic squirrel, and Bean, a grumpy but clever beagle - the sisters follow a trail of purple ink drops and the distinct scent of grape-flavored printer ink to uncover the truth. Their sleuthing reveals Jake Stevens, the principal's son, orchestrating an elaborate scheme to fund his vintage gaming dreams. This charming mystery weaves together themes of music, friendship, and problem-solving while teaching valuable lessons about honesty and creative fundraising alternatives.
Learn More: • 'Even the Rich: Taylor Swift: Fearless | Mastermind' (https://wondery.com/shows/even-the-rich/episode/6807-taylor-swift-fearless-mastermind/) • 'School of Rock - Movie' (https://www.amazon.com/School-Rock-Jack-Black/dp/B000IZ8V4W) • 'Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour - Documentary' (https://www.amazon.com/Taylor-Swift-Eras-Tour/dp/B0CQMZNQZ3) • 'Kids Mystery Series Podcast' (https://wondery.com/shows/stories-podcast/)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Great Cupcake Caper: When Raccoons Crash the Party
item.itunes:title: The Great Cupcake Caper: When Raccoons Crash the Party
item.description:
A mysterious disappearance of birthday cupcakes leads Vera, Nina, and their animal companions on a whimsical adventure through Santa Monica. When Vera's specially prepared birthday treats vanish without a trace, the gang discovers a trail of telltale crumbs and a peculiar lavender scent leading from their backyard through the bustling Summer Soulstice Festival. With Bean the grumpy but lovable beagle providing sarcastic commentary and Herman the squirrel offering questionable wisdom about scented pinecones, the mystery unfolds across familiar local landmarks. The investigation culminates at Marine Park, where they stumble upon an unexpected gathering – a raccoon birthday celebration complete with tiny party hats and Vera's missing cupcakes. This charming tale weaves together themes of friendship, forgiveness, and finding joy in unexpected places, while showcasing the vibrant community spirit of Santa Monica's Main Street and the surprising ways that Nina's well-intentioned but misguided perfume experiment leads to an unforgettable birthday adventure.
Learn More: • Stories Podcast: A Bedtime Show for Kids - "Pizza Raccoons" (https://wondery.com/shows/stories-podcast/episode/5585-pizza-raccoons/) • "Urban Wildlife: A Guide to City Critters" (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/animals/article/urban-wildlife-guide) • "Santa Monica Summer Soulstice Festival Guide" (https://www.santamonica.com/event/summer-soulstice/) • "Marine Park Santa Monica - Visitor Information" (https://www.santamonica.gov/parks/marine-park)

item.title: The Case of the Puzzling Pasta Piece
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Puzzling Pasta Piece
item.description:
A missing puzzle piece leads Vera, Nina, and their animal companions on a delightful neighborhood adventure in Santa Monica. When the final piece of their challenging 2000-piece spaghetti puzzle disappears, the sisters team up with their elderly beagle Bean and the theatrical squirrel Herman to solve the mystery. Following Bean's expert nose, their investigation takes them from kitchen crumbs to the Gelson's parking lot, ultimately discovering that a confused squirrel named Marvin mistook the glossy puzzle piece for an exotic nut. item.title: The Birthday Heist of the Miniature Mice
item.itunes:title: The Birthday Heist of the Miniature Mice
item.description:
A mysterious birthday morning turns into an enchanting adventure when Vera discovers all her presents have vanished from their wrapping paper, leaving only empty boxes behind. Together with her sister Nina, their detective beagle Bean, and Herman the theatrical squirrel, they uncover an unexpected surprise living within the walls of Vera's closet. Following a trail of glitter behind her makeup cases, they discover a family of mice hosting their own parallel birthday celebration with Vera's borrowed gifts. This heartwarming mystery showcases the power of sharing, understanding, and finding joy in unexpected places. Through clever investigation and teamwork, the young sleuths transform what could have been a birthday disaster into a memorable moment of wonder, complete with a creative solution to relocate their tiny party crashers to a custom-built backyard mouse mansion.

item.title: The Case of the Tamagotchi Shark Heist
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Tamagotchi Shark Heist
item.description:
A mysterious disappearance at the Heal the Bay Aquarium sets fourth-graders Nina and Mishka on an unexpected adventure during their class field trip. When a baby leopard shark vanishes from the new outdoor nursery exhibit, the young detectives, along with their quirky companions - Herman the squirrel and Bean the beagle - follow a trail of glitter and wet footprints that leads to an important lesson about responsibility. Their investigation takes them past the iconic Santa Monica Pier gift shop, where they discover fellow student Sarah Martinez's well-intentioned but misguided attempt at marine biology practice. The story weaves together themes of friendship, problem-solving, and learning from mistakes, all while showcasing the unique educational environment of the Heal the Bay Aquarium. This heartwarming episode combines marine science education with gentle humor, featuring memorable characters and the picturesque setting of Santa Monica Pier's renowned aquarium facility, where over 100 local species make their home.

item.title: The Halloween Glitter Mystery: A Squirrel's Secret Dance Show
item.itunes:title: The Halloween Glitter Mystery: A Squirrel's Secret Dance Show
item.description:
A Halloween mystery unfolds when Nina's Mirabel costume from Encanto vanishes just minutes before trick-or-treating begins. With the help of her sister Vera, dressed as Wednesday Addams, their theatrical squirrel friend Herman, and a reluctant beagle named Bean, the search begins through Nina's hurricane-swept room. Following a trail of purple glitter to the closet, they discover Herman's well-intentioned but chaotic attempt to enhance the costume with Christmas lights and choreography notes, inspired by a Broadway production of Cats. What starts as a costume crisis transforms into a heartwarming moment when they realize Herman's glittery additions actually improve the magical Mirabel ensemble, making it even more special for their candy-collecting adventure through Santa Monica.

item.title: The Ice Cream Caper: A Gameboy Giveaway
item.itunes:title: The Ice Cream Caper: A Gameboy Giveaway
item.description:
A thrilling chase through Venice Beach unfolds when a designer purse snatcher disrupts a peaceful afternoon on Abbott Kinney Boulevard. Young detectives Vera and Nina, along with their faithful beagle Bean and witty squirrel companion Herman, spring into action from their spot at Salt & Straw ice cream parlor. The investigation takes an unexpected turn when they discover a working GameBoy Color behind a dumpster - an unusual clue in 2025. Following a trail of scattered receipts to the Venice Canals, the team connects the dots between their ice cream order, the vintage gaming device, and the teenage culprit. The case showcases the charm of Venice Beach's iconic locations while weaving together elements of mystery, friendship, and justice, all sparked by a stolen Dooney & Bourke purse. Through clever deduction and teamwork (plus a perfectly-timed slip on melted ice cream), our young sleuths prove that even the smallest detectives can solve big cases in their beloved beachside community.

item.title: The Case of the Ring, the Squirrel, and the Supermarket Sleuth
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Ring, the Squirrel, and the Supermarket Sleuth
item.description:
A young piano teacher's missing engagement ring sets off an enchanting adventure through the streets of Santa Monica, as sisters Vera and Nina team up with their grumpy beagle Bean and Herman the squirrel to crack the case. When Miss Martinez discovers her rose gold ring has vanished somewhere between Gelson's produce aisle and her car, the unlikely detective squad springs into action. While Nina and Herman investigate inside the store, Vera and Bean's outdoor search leads them to mysterious clues - a receipt for retro candy and some skateboarding suspects at Marine Park. Through clever deduction, teamwork, and Herman's dramatic flair for tight spaces, they ultimately discover the ring wedged in an unexpected place: the automatic door track at Gelson's, where Miss Martinez had been practicing a TikTok dance trend. This whimsical mystery showcases the power of observation, collaboration, and thinking outside the box - even when the solution is right under your nose.

item.title: The Great Sheet Music Switcheroo
item.itunes:title: The Great Sheet Music Switcheroo
item.description:
When Nina's sheet music for her crucial Santa Monica Conservatory piano audition vanishes, a whimsical mystery unfolds in the heart of their Sunset Park neighborhood. With her sister Vera, their intuitive beagle Bean, and Herman the theatrical squirrel by her side, Nina traces her steps back to Marine Park, where yesterday's soccer practice holds the key to the missing Für Elise score. The investigation reveals a wind-swept mix-up involving Kevin, a fellow piano student, whose Super Mario Bros. sheet music had become entangled with Nina's classical pieces. Through clever deduction and Bean's keen nose, the unlikely detective squad unravels the musical mystery, ensuring Nina can continue perfecting her Beethoven performance. This charming tale weaves together sisterly support, animal intuition, and the unexpected ways life's little mishaps lead to serendipitous encounters.

item.title: The Great Homework Heist: When Marie Kondo Strikes
item.itunes:title: The Great Homework Heist: When Marie Kondo Strikes
item.description:
A missing math homework sparks an endearing mystery in the latest episode of The Curious Cases of Vera and Nina. When Nina's carefully completed fraction packet vanishes along with her beloved Lisa Frank folder, panic ensues in their Santa Monica home. With only four hours until the assignment is due, Nina and her practical sister Vera, aided by their drowsy beagle Bean and the theatrical squirrel Herman, embark on a household investigation. The mystery takes an unexpected turn when Bean's keen nose leads them to the recycling bin, where they discover the homework accidentally discarded during their mom's Marie Kondo-inspired cleaning spree. The case of the missing homework teaches valuable lessons about organization, family dynamics, and how sometimes the simplest explanation is the correct one. This charming episode perfectly balances humor and heart while showcasing the unique dynamic between the sisters and their animal companions.

item.title: The Great Poop Heist of Sunset Park
item.itunes:title: The Great Poop Heist of Sunset Park
item.description:
A mysterious disappearance of dog waste across Sunset Park leads Vera, her elderly beagle Bean, and her friend Nina on an unexpected environmental investigation. When Bean's morning walk reveals the inexplicable absence of all canine deposits throughout the neighborhood, the discovery triggers a wave of confusion and concern among local residents. With the help of Herman, a theatrical squirrel, the team follows a trail of clues including sightings of a suspicious "Night Soil Solutions" van and puzzling posts on neighborhood apps. Their detective work ultimately uncovers an innovative secret project by Santa Monica College environmental science students, who had been collecting the waste for conversion into fertilizer for a community garden. This whimsical mystery blends elements of community engagement, environmental sustainability, and creative problem-solving, showcasing how unexpected solutions can emerge from seemingly peculiar situations.

item.title: The Sunscreen Scam at Sunset Beach
item.itunes:title: The Sunscreen Scam at Sunset Beach
item.description:
A mysterious odor at Santa Monica Beach leads young detectives Vera and Nina to uncover a dangerous sunscreen scam threatening beachgoers' safety. When their trusty beagle Bean discovers bottles of counterfeit sunscreen scattered across the sand, the sisters realize someone has been replacing legitimate sun protection with a hazardous mixture of coconut and fish oils. Their investigation reveals that local vendor Mr. Peterson unknowingly distributed the fake products, putting tourists at risk of severe sunburns. This engaging mystery highlights the importance of proper sun protection and consumer safety while weaving in elements of environmental awareness through references to reef-safe sunscreen regulations. With help from their theatrical squirrel friend Herman, the sisters work to remove the dangerous products from circulation, demonstrating the value of community vigilance and the serious consequences of counterfeit consumer goods.
Learn More: • 'The Truth About Reef Safe Sunscreen' (https://www.consumerreports.org/health/sunscreens/the-truth-about-reef-safe-sunscreen-a3578637894/) • 'Best Sunscreens for Kids and Babies Guide' (https://www.ewg.org/sunscreen/best-sunscreens/baby-kids-sunscreens/) • 'Reef Safe Sunscreen Guide' (https://savethereef.org/about-reef-save-sunscreen.html) • 'Beach Safety for Kids - Book' (https://amazon.com/books/beach-safety-kids)
Note: This content was generated using artificial intelligence and may contain factual errors or inaccuracies. Please verify any important information from reliable sources.

item.title: The Case of the Missing Theater Director
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Missing Theater Director
item.description:
A whimsical mystery unfolds in the heart of Santa Monica as Herman, the theatrical squirrel, goes missing from his regular Sunday pancake-watching ritual. Sisters Vera and Nina, accompanied by their skeptical beagle Bean, embark on an adventure through the city's parks searching for their dramatic rodent friend. Their investigation leads them from Marine Park's "summer palace" to Memorial Park's impromptu theater spaces, following a trail of organic walnuts down Ocean Park Boulevard. The mystery culminates behind Whole Foods, where they discover Herman directing an ambitious summer production with his squirrel theater troupe. This charming tale weaves together elements of friendship, performing arts, and the unexpected places where passion for theater can be found, even in the most unlikely of performers.

item.title: The Case of the Sticky Slugger
item.itunes:title: The Case of the Sticky Slugger
item.description:
A missing lucky softball bat threatens to derail the Santa Monica Sharks' championship hopes, leading sisters Vera and Nina, along with their quirky animal companions Bean the beagle and Herman the squirrel, on another delightful investigation. When Coach Martinez's vintage Louisville Slugger disappears before the big game, the young detectives follow a trail of clues—and bubble gum—that leads them to an unexpected culprit. Through clever deduction and teamwork, they discover the bat hidden under the bleachers, covered in mysterious green goo that turns out to be Herman's dropped fruit snack. The case showcases the perfect blend of mystery-solving skills, friendship, and the importance of honesty when bat boy Tommy Chen confesses to borrowing the lucky charm for practice. This heartwarming episode demonstrates how small misunderstandings can lead to valuable lessons, all while maintaining the series' signature mix of humor, adventure, and problem-solving that young listeners have come to love.
Learn More: • 'Wow in the World' (https://wondery.com/shows/wow-in-the-world) • 'The Softball Mystery - Book' (https://www.amazon.com/Softball-Mystery-Matthew-Zisi/dp/B08KBQS9LV) • 'Karen's Softball Mystery - Book' (https://www.amazon.com/Karens-Softball-Mystery-Baby-sitters-Little/dp/0590262149) • 'The Daily Smile' (https://wondery.com/shows/the-daily-smile)
